Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1984...
Had first career hit on 4/28/1986, off John Verhoeven (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1986, off Tom Johnson (NYM)...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1989, hitting .474 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Atlanta on 8/12/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1989, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Atlanta on 9/10/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1990, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1991, hitting .448 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 9/4/1991...
Won MVP Award in 1991, hitting .309 with 33 HR, 122 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1992, hitting .565 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1992, hitting .474 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1992, hitting .320 with 6 HR, 22 RBI...
Drove in 8 runs against Houston on 6/27/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1992, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1992, hitting .376 with 10 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1992, hitting .448 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won MVP Award in 1992, hitting .313 with 43 HR, 129 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1992...
Injured on 5/30/1993 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Houston on 1/31/1994 (Going to HOU: P R. Clemens, LF G. Vaughn, 2B M. McGwire. Going to CHC: 1B J. Thome, RF J. Gonzalez, RF R. Greer, P D. Wells, C E. Wedge)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1994, hitting .550 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Houston in 1994...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1995, hitting .318 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1995, hitting .367 with 5 HR, 11 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 6/10/1995...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Houston in 1995...
Injured on 4/1/1996 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/24/1996 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against Atlanta on 6/17/1996...
Injured on 8/19/1996 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 6/7/1997...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 8/22/1997...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1997, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
